Advantages of the module:Saves you time updating, backing up and restoring.Guides you through the key steps of these processes.Secures your store with preventive backups before updating.Minimises risk with automatic compatibility checks.Keeps your store compliant with officially supported versions.Saves you money by simplifying updates.The Update Assistant module is an essential tool for users who want to keep their PrestaShop store up to date easily and efficiently.

module.name: jmarketplace
module.description: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission
module.author: JA Modules
module.description_full: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission.
module.additional_description: We are quality leaders and PrestaShop experts with more than 15 years of experience in the sector and we can guarantee that this product can help you a lot to get the goal you want. We know and like what we do, that's why we offer you the best of us, in a very complete product and at the best price. Our module, your trust marketplace. This module is synonymous with analysis, constant work and innovation. We always listen to your suggestions and requests to improve it and make a more competent, complete product with a good technical support team that is attentive to solve all doubts and problems, always giving the best possible result. Benefits for administrator Expansion catalog with products from other sellers.More sales possibilities.More offer for customers.Compatible with any payment method.All customer purchases are received by the market. When appropriate, vendor commissions can be paid.Very complete management of sellers, products, commissions, etc.Very complete control panel or dashboard where you will be able to see all the market advances.Fixed commission per sale.Variable commission by seller, category or levels (Bronze, Silver and Gold).Super complete configuration per page or functionality. You will not have to modify the code to enable or disable functions on the front.Communication system between client, seller and administrator through the platform.Compatible with most of the available themes. It is ideal to choose a theme that it has been developed with Bootstrap 3 technology or higher. Benefits for the seller Easy and intuitive product management.Export and import products en masse.Management of the seller profile.Commission history.Order history and management.Creates your own carriers and shipping rates.Selection of the preferred payment method to collect your commissions.Graph of commissions received.Request for withdrawal of funds.Centralized marketplace message box.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Effortlessly sell on Amazon, eBay, and various global marketplaces straight from your shop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Effortlessly sell on Amazon, eBay, and various global marketplaces straight from your shop. magnalister streamlines uploading products and automates follow-up tasks like order imports, price-inventory matching, and beyond for a smoother operation.
module.additional_description: Easily integrate your PrestaShop with major online marketplaces like Amazon, eBay, and others through magnalister, and take advantage of essential features including product uploads, order imports, price and inventory synchronization, order status reconciliation, invoice creation and distribution, along with numerous automation capabilities. As of April 2024, we support a diverse array of platforms: Amazon, eBay, Cdiscount, Rakuten FR, Etsy, OTTO, METRO, Kaufland.de, Ricardo, hood.de, plus price comparison sites such as Check24 and idealo. We're constantly expanding our network, adding more high-traffic national and international marketplaces, and regularly enhancing the functionality of the magnalister PrestaShop Addon to meet your evolving needs. Discover the full potential of magnalister with a 30-day free trial, and explore the complete suite of features without any cost!

module.name: ndksteppingpack
module.description: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step"
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog.
module.additional_description: Increase sales of targeted products in your catalog. Increase the value of the basket of your visitors by influencing on sets of products. Guide your customers in the selection of your products. With this module you create as many steps as you want, each with an arbitrary selection of products. For each step you set a minimum rule adding to cart. Once validated rule, your customer can go to the next step. Once all the steps validated, your customer can finalize the order and receive the discount you have set in your pack! New: fix a price for your pack, the system automatically created a product pack and synchronize your stocks.

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp
module.author: Smartsupp
module.description_full: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp. We offer everything you need to grow your business: chatbot, live chat, Mira AI shopping assistant and much more you can use to engage your visitors at the right time.
module.additional_description: Jumpstart your sales and boost conversions with Smartsupp. Our packages offer everything you need: chatbot, live chat and Mira AI shopping assistant to help you turn visitors into customers. Automate responses to repetitive questions and provide a personal touch when it matters the most. Gain insights into your customer service with accurate statistics – track customer satisfaction, agents' performance efficiency, and more. If you want to use one of the world's most trusted live chat and AI chatbot apps, use Smartsupp. We currently power up over 100,000 webshops and websites so they can:Chat with customers and build powerful relationships. Our easy-to-install, fast chatbot is complemented by Messenger, email and WhatsApp, so every conversation is accessible via our mobile apps.Convert visitors into customers by running powerful lead gen campaigns with automated messages and chatbots.Automate up to 80% of customer queries with Mira, our powerful AI chatbot, available 24/7 and always ready to assist.Understand the conversation flow, how happy your customers are with your team and offering, and what they ask about – but also who converts and requires your attention. What our users say about us? "We have 23 live chat agents available from 6 a.m. to midnight. Most frequently, customers text in the evening, though. Thanks to Smartsupp's solutions, we sell 900 cars a month."—Jan Duchoň, AAA AUTO "One of the advantages of Smartsupp chat for us is that it is always visible at a glance when browsing the e-shop. Our customers know that we are there for them 24/7, and they can contact us at any time – whether they use the chatbot or the live chat."—Jan Kučera, ASKO - NÁBYTEK "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a trusted, secure, and convenient payment method that allows your customers to use their existing Amazon account to make purchases on your PrestaShop store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a trusted, secure, and convenient payment method that allows your customers to use their existing Amazon account to make purchases on your PrestaShop store. By integrating Amazon Pay, you can provide your customers with a familiar and streamlined checkout experience that leverages Amazon's technology, learnings, and industry-leading best practises. To get started, merchants first need to register for an Amazon Pay account. Once registered, you can easily integrate the Amazon Pay addon with your PrestaShop online store.
module.additional_description: By offering Amazon Pay, you can:Reduce checkout friction: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks, with Amazon recognising active logins to avoid re-entering billing, shipping, and payment information. This frictionless checkout experience can help reduce cart abandonment and increase conversion rates by 35%1.Enhance Brand Trust:  The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust. Customers feel confident and secure when they see the Amazon brand at your store's checkout, leading to higher sales3.Benefit from Advanced Fraud Protection:  Amazon's industry-leading fraud detection and security measures help reduce decline handling and fraud risk, giving your customers peace of mind and your business financial protection.Reach International Shoppers: Multi-currency support for Amazon Pay makes it easier for international customers to complete purchases on your PrestaShop store, reducing friction in the checkout process and helping you expand your global reach. [1]: Comscore custom study for Amazon Pay comparing conversion rates between Amazon Pay and native merchant checkouts in the U.S. over a 5-month period from October 2021 – March 2022, n=40. [2]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [3]:  Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

module.name: crisp
module.description: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants. The platform comes with a live chat widget, an AI Chatbot and many other features that deeply integrates with your Prestashop online store.
module.additional_description: Transform your customer service into a new acquisition's channel Crisp is a multichannel customer experience platform that helps online store to centralize inbound messages to land into one inbox, allowing merchants to avoid switching back and forth between Facebook, Instagram, Email Inbox or WhatsApp and phone calls. Through a powerful data synchronization between Prestashop and Crisp, merchants can create personnalized and unique support experience. No matter customer's state, retailers will aways stay ahead. The platform offers ready-to-use tools that will make online merchants ready and powerful today, not in a month: Sales and FAQ chatbot templates, empowered by AI and trained on product data are designed to increase revenue and answer repetitive customer's questions. Through a flat-rate pricing, merchants using Crisp for Prestashop can preserve their margins while scaling their customer support process. All-in-all, Crisp for Prestashop doesn't only provide a live chat, an AI Chatbot or a shared inbox: It's full suite of tools dedicated at making online merchants more efficient in their daily customers' relationship tasks. How does Crisp stands out from the crowd?- 55% resolution rate powered by Crisp AI Chatbot- 100% no-code solution to empower teams from any sector- Lightweight chat widget made not to slowdown website loading speed- Free mobile and desktop iOs & Android app- Flat-rate pricing on all our plans- In-house AI models for better privacy-driven companies Simple things you can do to scale your customer support in less than 5 minutes- Decrease bounce rate and CPC with proactive and personnalized chat messages- Improve average number of conversations per agent by creating templated message that leverage dynamic data shared through Prestashop data- Connect channels such as emails, Instagram DMs or Messenger to your Crisp inbox- Build bots to automate repetitive questions on any channels thanks to ready-to-use chatbot templates- Train AI models on custom data such as website data, product data or conversational data. Numbers behind Crisp- 500 000 customers around the world- 50+ languages available- 210 000 000 users each month- 24/5 customer support available in 5 different languages

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

module.name: socialbugcrm

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Module to connect with SocialBugCRM platform.
module.additional_description: SocialBugCRM is a modular cloud CRM service. It helps extend the functionality of your website to accomplish specific business processes. While your shopping cart may focus on completing a sale, our system will help capture every other part of the business transaction.SocialBugCRM will create an interactive widget on your website and works with your existing sites secure authentication. Easily create a seamless single sign-on from your website into our CRM. An example use case would be for affiliate party plan companies, once your website user authenticates, they can click on the widget to enter into the CRM and create party orders. Another example would be for any type of membership website in which you want to offer your end customers a custom portal where your specific business rules have been digitized business. After installation, when clicking “Launch” for the first time, a separate account will automatically be created. You do not need to manually register on any 3rd party website, everything is automatic. Pricing for SocialBugCRM varies. Fee’s start around 60€ /month. You can contact the SocialBugCRM team for more information.

module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features&q
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features" tab). The PS EventBus module enables the synchronisation of technical and non-personal data between your shop and these other modules installed on your shop. This synchronisation is necessary for the good operation of the modules concerned. Uninstalling the PS EventBus module may cause these modules to crash or even stop working completely.

module.description: YouPay is an IBAN account and a payment plugin

module.additional_description: The YouPay IBAN account and payment plugin for SEPA and cryptocurrency can offer several advantages to merchants who integrate it into their e-commerce sites. Here are some of these potential benefits:Customer base expansion: By accepting payments in SEPA and cryptocurrencies, merchants can attract customers who prefer to use digital currencies to make online purchases. This can help expand the potential customer base and increase sales.Reduced transaction fees: Cryptocurrency payments typically involve lower transaction fees than traditional credit card or bank transfer payments. Merchants can therefore save money on transaction fees and increase their profit margin.Increased security: Cryptocurrency payments are encrypted and anonymous, which can help reduce the risks of fraud and theft of personal information. In addition, cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible, making it difficult for customers to dispute transactions after they have been made.Easier international transactions: Cryptocurrency payments are not subject to foreign exchange restrictions or conversion fees, making international transactions easier for both merchants and customers.Innovative image: Integrating cryptocurrency payment solutions can give merchants an innovative and forward-thinking image, which can help improve their reputation and positioning in the market.Commissions: The merchant has the possibility to set the coefficient of his commissions between 1% and 5%

module.name: btecommercecopilot

module.additional_description: The daily task of writing product descriptions can be tedious and time-consuming. And we know that your time is precious. That's why we're providing you with an e-commerce co-pilot that will help you create the best possible, SEO-optimized descriptions in the shortest possible time. Our "E-commerce Copilot" module lets you use the power of GPT-4 artificial intelligence to generate your product and category descriptions, as well as the content of your CMS pages. Don't spend hours manually writing your product descriptions: team up with a qualified partner and save time every day! SAVE TIME EVERY DAY The module installs an e-commerce content writing wizard on your PrestaShop store, saving you time every day: choose the type of content you want to write (short, long or meta description of a product or category, CMS page content), ask the AI to generate it, proofread it, modify it if necessary, then save! In just a few clicks, you'll have a complete, SEO-optimized text with minimum effort. In the same way, you can ask GPT-4 to translate content into any of your store's languages.We've already drawn up prompts for you to send to GPT-4, so that you can start using the module as soon as it's installed, and save time in the process. However, if for any reason you'd like to write your own prompts, you can! A tab in the module configuration is dedicated to customizing prompts.Finally, there's no need to go outside the product creation forms to use AI: we've integrated the tool for generating and translating product descriptions directly within the forms. This allows you to enlist the help of your co-pilot directly during the product creation process! You can also call on your e-commerce assistant at any time, wherever you are in the back office of your PrestaShop store. The AI can be accessed directly via a menu section in your PrestaShop store. KEEP CONTROL OVER THE QUALITY OF YOUR CONTENT Artificial Intelligence is powerful, but it can't completely replace you. That's why we've made it a point of honor to let you control the content generated, ensuring that the text is consistent and perfectly reflects your vision and the style of your store. Once your approval has been obtained, the module automatically saves the new texts or translations.

This frees up admin resources to focus on other critical aspects of managing the online store, such as product management, customer support, and marketing. Targeted Marketing: User groups enable merchants to tailor marketing campaigns and promotions to specific segments of their customer base. This targeted approach can lead to higher conversion rates and increased sales. Validate Users at Registration Module provides merchants with tools to enhance security, streamline administrative tasks, improve communication, and optimize customer management. module.name: prettylinks
module.displayName: Pretty URLs: Friendly URL Cleaner | Removes Numbers
module.description: PrestaShop Pretty Friendly URLs Cleaner improves the rankings of your store by creating URLs that are more user-friendly by removing the auto generated IDs or numbers from products, categories, manufa
module.author: FME Modules
module.description_full: PrestaShop Pretty Friendly URLs Cleaner improves the rankings of your store by creating URLs that are more user-friendly by removing the auto generated IDs or numbers from products, categories, manufacturers, and other pages within your store.
module.additional_description: Introducing PrestaShop Pretty Friendly URL Module: Your Ultimate Solution for SEO-Friendly URLs You can now unlock the full potential of your PrestaShop store with our latest PrestaShop Pretty URLs, the definitive module designed to revolutionize your website's URL structure. Get rid of cumbersome auto-generated IDs and numbers cluttering your URLs and stopping you from getting to get top of your search engine rankings. With PrestaShop Pretty URLs Module, you can transform your store's URLs into clean, concise, and SEO-friendly links that enhance both user experience and search engine visibility. By removing auto-generated IDs and numbers from your PrestaShop store's URLs, PrestaShop Pretty URL Cleaner Module significantly improves your website's SEO performance. This results in higher rankings on search engine results pages (SERPs) and increased organic traffic. Clean and readable URLs not only boost your SEO efforts but also enhance the overall user experience. With PrestaShop Pretty URLs Module, your customers can navigate your website effortlessly, leading to higher engagement and conversion rates. PrestaShop Pretty URLs Friendly URL Module seamlessly redirects old URLs to their updated counterparts, ensuring that your visitors land on the right page every time. This ensures that all of your 404 errors are automatically catered for. This also saves you from the potential loss of your rankings due to the change in the url. Our Pretty URLs Module allows you to tailor your URLs to suit your brand and target audience. From product pages to categories, manufacturers and suppliers you have full control over your website's URL structure. Our module is designed with user-friendliness in mind. With simple installation steps and seamless integration into your PrestaShop store, you can start using it right away. In fact you can have your whole store's URLs cleaned in a matter of minutes after installing our module.

module.description_full: Transform an eCommerce store into a functional iOS or Android app with the PrestaMobApp Subscription-based Module. Enhance engagement through push notifications and boost sales while benefiting from support for multiple payment and shipping options.
module.additional_description: Transform your Prestashop store into a fully functional mobile app with the PrestaMobApp Subscription Module. This Prestashop mobile app solution empowers you to create a native Prestashop app for iOS and Android devices without coding. In just a few clicks, you can turn your Prestashop store into a Prestashop Android or iOS app, and have it ready in under 3 days. Seamless Integration for Real-Time Updates The PrestaMobApp mobile app easily integrates with your existing Prestashop store, offering real-time synchronization of your products, orders, and shipments. This seamless connection means you can manage your store on the go without needing to access your BackOffice via a PC. With the Prestashop app mobile, you will receive instant updates directly to your mobile devices, including sales statistics, order statuses, and shipment tracking; empowering you to manage your e-commerce business from anywhere. Unlock Higher Conversion Rates with a PrestaShop Mobile App By transitioning to a mobile app Prestashop solution, one can tap into the significant advantages mobile apps offer over traditional mobile websites. With the Prestashop mobile app builder, merchants can create a personalized and streamlined shopping experience that leads to higher conversion rates, increased revenue, and improved customer loyalty. Mobile apps enhance user experience and encourage repeat purchases, making your Prestashop app mobile a key driver of business growth. Customizable Branding and User Experience The Prestashop app builder offers extensive customization options, allowing merchants to match your app with the brand's identity. Whether you build a Prestashop Android app or a Prestashop iOS app, you can easily design a user-friendly interface that keeps customers engaged and coming back for more. A well-designed Prestashop native app creates a shopping haven, promoting customer satisfaction and seamless navigation. Boost Engagement and Revenue with the SAAS-based PrestaMobApp Module PrestaMobApp is designed to help an e-commerce business achieve its full potential. The subscription-based model provides a simple, cost-effective way to establish a mobile app presence without the hassle of coding or complicated setups. With push notifications, customers stay engaged, leading to higher sales and greater brand loyalty. The result is a Prestashop Android or iOS app that becomes a powerful tool for effortless customer engagement and improved sales performance. Why Choose PrestaMobApp (SAAS)? No coding required: Create a Prestashop mobile app without the need for technical expertise.Real-time synchronization: Keep products, orders, and customers updated across all platforms.Custom branding: Tailor the app's design to align with your brand and provide a personalized user experience.Boost sales and engagement: With a Prestashop app mobile, enjoy improved customer retention, higher conversion rates, and better engagement.Enhanced security: Provide a safe shopping experience with features like fingerprint authentication.Multiple payment options: Support over 10 payment gateways for seamless transactions.Effortless app management: Use the intuitive admin panel for easy customization and management. Note:Check out our demo app on the Google Play Store. Simply search for "PrestaMobApp," download, and explore its features. Supported Payment Methods:PaycometNqoodypayMercadopagoPayPalPaysonMolliePaystackPayPlugYandexPaytabs Elevate your e-commerce business with PrestaMobApp, a SaaS-based mobile app solution designed specifically for Prestashop stores. This SAAS module enables merchants to create a fully functional Prestashop mobile app for both iOS and Android devices, without requiring any coding skills. With PrestaMobApp, you can focus on growing your business while we take care of the technical side, offering continuous updates, support, and scalability. Effortless App Creation – No Coding Needed Gone are the days of complicated app development. With PrestaMobApp, you can easily create your mobile app for both Android and iOS apps. The intuitive platform handles all the technical aspects, allowing you to launch your mobile app in a matter of days without coding experience. This Prestashop app builder simplifies the process, giving you a professional app ready to use almost immediately. Seamless Integration with Prestashop Store PrestaMobApp integrates flawlessly with your existing Prestashop store, ensuring a smooth transition to mobile commerce. It synchronizes product listings, categories, orders, and customer information in real time, so your app always reflects the latest updates from your store.  Build Your Brand with Customization Options Building your brand on mobile is easier than ever with PrestaMobApp. Tailor the design of your Prestashop native app to match your unique brand identity. From the app's appearance to its functionality, you have full control over customization, helping reinforce your brand image while providing a user-friendly experience for your customers. Create a distinctive and engaging mobile presence that reflects your commitment to customer satisfaction. Boost User Engagement with Easy Navigation The Prestashop mobile app builder makes it easy for customers to shop on their mobile devices. With intuitive navigation, users can easily browse products, add items to their cart, and check out quickly; all within the app. The streamlined shopping experience keeps customers engaged, reducing friction and increasing the likelihood of conversion. The Prestashop app mobile provides a seamless and enjoyable shopping journey that encourages repeat purchases. Limitless Customizations Want more control over your app's features? PrestaMobApp offers extensive customization options to meet your specific requirements. Whether it's additional features or changes to the app's design, we offer flexible solutions (with additional charges). Customize the Prestashop native app to ensure it fully aligns with your business goals and delivers the best possible experience for your customers. Enhanced Security with Finger Login Ensure your customers' data is safe and their experience is seamless with Finger Login integration. PrestaMobApp allows users to log in to their accounts using fingerprint authentication securely. This added layer of security boosts trust and enhances convenience, making it easier for customers to access their accounts quickly and safely on their iOS or Android apps. Increase Customer Trust Reviews Build trust and drive engagement by enabling customers to leave product reviews directly within the app. You can create a community-driven shopping environment by allowing customers to share their experiences. Reviews help other customers make informed purchasing decisions, enhancing the overall shopping experience within your Prestashop mobile app. Reduce Cart Abandonment Cart abandonment is a common challenge in e-commerce, but with PrestaMobApp, you can reduce it significantly. The smooth and intuitive mobile shopping experience eliminates the need for customers to switch to a desktop, which often leads to cart abandonment. By providing a convenient mobile shopping platform, your customers are more likely to complete their purchases, leading to higher conversion rates and reduced drop-offs. Support for Multiple Payment Gateways PrestaMobApp supports over 10 payment gateways out of the box, making it easy for your customers to complete their purchases securely. Additionally, we offer the flexibility to integrate a custom payment gateway at no extra cost, giving you the freedom to offer the payment options your customers prefer. Whether you're using the Prestashop native mobile app builder, your customers will have access to a variety of trusted payment methods.

module.name: adminmobapp
module.displayName: Prestashop Admin App: Manage Presta Store Anywhere
module.description: PrestaShop Admin App allows store admins to manage store’s sales, orders, products, customers, notifications and content from iOS/Android mobiles
module.author: FME Modules
module.description_full: PrestaShop Admin App allows store admins to manage store’s sales, orders, products, customers, notifications and content from iOS/Android mobiles. It features a secure environment and multi-language support, provides more efficient store management.
module.additional_description: PrestaShop Admin App allows e-merchants to manage their PrestaShop store operations seamlessly from any mobile device, whether iOS or Android. By providing a comprehensive dashboard, the admin app for PrestaShop offers immediate access to crucial metrics such as sales figures, order counts, visitor statistics, and conversion rates. This real-time data enables store administrators to make informed decisions and conduct detailed performance analysis, enhancing overall efficiency. App’s real-time order management features ensure that store admins can update order statuses, download invoices, and receive instant notifications on new orders. These features results in faster, more accurate order processing and improved customer satisfaction, as issues are addressed promptly and orders are fulfilled efficiently. In addition, the admin app's robust product management capabilities allow for the easy addition or updating of products. Admin can enter details like EAN (European Article Number) codes, weight, and dimensions, manage product attributes, and upload images directly from mobile device. This streamlines inventory management and keeps product listings current, driving increased sales and customer engagement. The customer management features further simplify operations by enabling you to add, update, or delete customer records and manage addresses. This streamlining of customer service and fulfillment processes leads to a smoother operation and a better overall customer experience. Major benefits offered by Prestashop admin mobile app are listed for a general overview: Real-Time Access to Metrics: Immediate access to sales figures, order counts, visitor statistics, and conversion rates for informed decision-making.Efficient Order Management: Quick updates to order statuses, invoice downloads, and instant notifications ensure faster and more accurate order processing.Streamlined Product Management: Easy addition or updating of products, including details like EAN codes and images, keeps inventory current and enhances product listings.Enhanced Customer Management: Simplified handling of customer records and addresses improves customer service and fulfillment processes. Features Offered by Prestashop Admin AppManage Your Store Anytime, AnywherePrestaShop Admin Mobile App allows admin to manage a PrestaShop store from any mobile device, whether iOS or Android. With its advanced encryption providing a secure connection, the app protects all sensitive data, including customer details and order information. This security prevents unauthorized access and data breaches, resulting in safe and reliable store management. Comprehensive DashboardPrestaShop Admin App features a comprehensive dashboard that centralizes key metrics such as sales figures, order counts, visitor statistics, conversion rates, and profit data. This centralization enables effective performance monitoring and quick access to critical data, leading to more informed decision-making and improved store management. Real-Time Order ManagementWith the Admin App for PrestaShop, admin can update order statuses, download invoices, and receive instant notifications on new orders. This capability results in fast and accurate order processing, minimizing delays and errors while enhancing overall efficiency. Efficient Product ManagementPrestaShop Admin App allows the admin to add new products, update existing ones, and manage product attributes and images directly from the device. By entering details such as EAN codes, product weight, and dimensions, admin streamline inventory management, which leads to more efficient stock handling and up-to-date product listings. Streamlined Customer ManagementBy using the Admin App for PrestaShop to easily add, update, or delete customer records and manage addresses, the mobile app admin can enhance order fulfillment and customer service. This leads to more accurate deliveries and improved customer interactions. Pages ManagementOversee product categories, update CMS content (e.g., About Us, Contact Information), and manage brand and supplier details with the PrestaShop Admin App to keep a store’s catalog and content organized. Secure EnvironmentPrestaShop Admin Mobile App uses advanced encryption methods to protect all sensitive information, which ensures data privacy and security. This protection prevents unauthorized access and data breaches, resulting in a secure management environment for your store. QR Code ConnectionConvenient QR code feature in the Admin App for PrestaShop allows you to quickly synchronize the app with the PrestaShop store, which eliminates the need for manual configuration and enables seamless management. Multi-Language SupportPrestaShop Admin App supports multiple languages, including English, French, Spanish, and German, enabling efficient navigation and management. This multilingual support ensures users from different linguistic backgrounds can effectively operate and manage the store. AvailabilityPrestaShop Admin Mobile App is freely available on the Google Play Store for Android and the App Store for iOS, which allows users to easily download and access the app, leading to widespread adoption and convenient mobile store management.

module.additional_description: EveryParts: simple, efficient searching for spare parts and accessories EveryParts is a complete solution for managing and searching spare parts for your store's products and equipment (vehicles, household appliances, motorcycles, etc.). In just a few clicks, centralize and unify your data from different suppliers, and offer your customers an ultra-fast search for parts compatible with their machines. Offer a powerful and flexible equipment search Your customers will easily find compatible parts for their equipment, enhancing their purchasing experience. EveryParts provides them with a search capable of filtering your entire catalog by this criterion. The ElasticSearch search engine guarantees fast, accurate results, even with a large database. Simplify spare parts integration and optimization With EveryParts, you benefit from powerful middleware that facilitates the exchange and management of data between different IT applications. Whether you sell appliance parts or vehicle equipment, EveryParts centralizes your suppliers' data sources, even if they are heterogeneous (APIs, flat files, etc.). The tool unifies this data and makes it available on your online store, making it easier for your customers to manage and find compatible parts. Exploit the SEO potential of your data and improve your ranking By integrating EveryParts into your PrestaShop store, you benefit from a structure and internal linkage optimized to promote indexing by search engines, even for very large volumes of data. The improved user experience also plays an important role, particularly on the Web Vitals that are taken into account in your positioning.

module.name: pmapplepaybf
module.displayName: Apple Pay - One click order, Checkout in 1 click
module.description: Discover our Apple Pay module on subscription. Apple Pay allows you to receive fast, biometric secured payments compatible with PSD2 (3D Secure 2): payment in one touch or one look
module.author: BusinessTech & PrestaModule
module.description_full: Discover our Apple Pay module on subscription. Apple Pay allows you to receive fast, biometric secured payments compatible with PSD2 (3D Secure 2): payment in one touch or one look. Uses Stripe payment gateway. Alternative or complementary to PayPal.
module.additional_description: Offer the Apple Pay experience on your shop and increase your conversion rate! Apple Pay, a synonym for simplicity and speed of payment Your customers will no longer need to fill out long forms to indicate their banking, delivery and billing information before finally being able to validate their order. A simple touch or a glance on their iPhone, iPad or Mac or a double click on their Apple Watch will be enough to finalize their transaction on your site.Our module further increases the speed of payment by allowing to display the button to buy in 1 click with Apple Pay directly from the product page and even from product list pages. Placing an order on your shop will never have been so easy and this will encourage your customers to come back to your site for future purchases. Apple Pay, the guarantee of a secure payment Apple Pay is PSD2 compliant and is safer to use than a credit card or traditional payment method. Each transaction requires biometric authentication (Face ID or Touch ID) or a passcode. In addition, Apple Pay guarantees the confidentiality of personal information. Apple does not store any data that can be used to identify your customers and as a merchant you never have direct access to their banking information. Everything is scrupulously encrypted. Apple does not charge any additional fees Installing and configuring the Apple Pay module on your shop is done in a few clicks. Apple will not charge you any additional fees. The most innovative businesses offer Apple Pay When Indiegogo's customers started using Apple Pay payment method for financing campaigns, the conversion rate of the company inceased up to 250%. OpenTable has implemented contactless payment with Apple Pay for ordering meals via its application and website. And Instacart was pleased to see that purchases were made 58% faster with Apple Pay than with other payment methods.

module.name: pmcaptchabf
module.displayName: Invisible CAPTCHA: reCAPTCHA anti fake account antispam
module.description: Discover our Invisible CAPTCHA module on subscription. Secure your forms invisibly against bots, spam, fake accounts. Discover a non-intrusive, more secure alternative to CAPTCHA and Google reCAPTCHA
module.author: BusinessTech & PrestaModule
module.description_full: Discover our Invisible CAPTCHA module on subscription. Secure your forms invisibly against bots, spam, fake accounts. Discover a non-intrusive, more secure alternative to CAPTCHA and Google reCAPTCHA. Use the Cloudflare Turnstile technology.
module.additional_description: REPLACE CLASSIC CAPTCHAS WITH CLOUDFLARE TURNSTILE TECHNOLOGY! The security of your data entry forms is essential to protect you from various cyber attacks (bruteforce, DDoS, ...) and avoid the generation of fake accounts, spam, phishing, ... However, setting up an anti-spam system like classic CAPTCHAs has its drawbacks, such as a degradation of the user experience, who finds himself blocked in his purchasing journey, or non-compliance with the RGPD. That's why Cloudflare has implemented the Turnstile technology to secure your site against bots, while ensuring optimal user experience and protection of personal data. Free, non-intrusive and accessible to everyone, its sole purpose is to secure your site against robot attacks. Our module automatically installs the Cloudflare script into your templates, without overrides, allowing you to secure all your forms with this smart alternative to traditional CAPTCHA and Google reCAPTCHA. CLOUDFLARE TURNSTILE ADVANTAGES Cloudflare's Turnstile technology offers great benefits: A frustration-free user experience: Tests are transparent to users: no puzzles or challenges to solve, tests run in the background and do not disrupt the user experience. They work thanks to non-interactive JavaScript tests that are responsible for detecting the user's human behavior (analysis of the visitor's or browser's singular behaviors). A technology adapted to all, regardless of their physical and cognitive abilities. A GDPR compliant technology: no collection of sensitive data, no placement of cookies, no transfer of information outside the European Union. Turnstile only consults session data to validate the user's human behavior and relies on data from device manufacturers or machine learning models. Concerned about data privacy, Turnstile never looks for cookies (like a login cookie), nor does it use cookies to collect or store any information. Free and available to everyone, whether or not you are a Cloudflare customer: Cloudflare Turnstile's sole purpose is to secure applications and websites. Even if you are not a Cloudflare customer, you can still use their secure form technology for your website. All you have to do is create a free account on their website. AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION OF THE SECURITY CODE AND WITHOUT OVERRIDES No templates to modify manually, the module takes care of everything! Just install the module, enter the secret keys available in your Cloudflare account and select the forms you want to secure. It's that easy. The module is also free of overrides.
